Diazo theme 'Sunburst'
======================

Plone 4's default theme 'Sunburst' reimplemented with Diazo [1]_ theme support [2]_

    :align: center

.. [1] https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Diazo
.. [2] http://diazo.org
